content: Good thing that happened today: made a beyond meat loaf and it tasted great!!
Hardee’s has beyond meat starting 12/30 let’s go baby
@sheetz @BeyondMeat Honestly. Truly. Y’all have gifted me with the best tasting, cheap fast food vegan burger that I can have in a small town so THANK YOU!

The @BeyondMeat burger at @sheetz checks out y’all 😍 #vegan #options! 

Tip: get it with BBQ sauce. Only 7$! https://t.co/nYPQL3JvAh
@Hardees why doesn’t your website allow customers to search which locations have the beyond meat items?
Can we talk about how delicious the @BeyondMeat Sausage sandos are at @dunkindonuts?! Wow. Pleasantly surprised.
@FUOMFWTBS @Dai4u13 You have to try it! Its delicious! But yeah, I use the beyond meat crumbles but I season the shit outta it to taste good. Boca burgers are bomb from Baker's !
#friday #lunch #special #beyondmeat #shrimp @ Tier 7 Eatery https://t.co/ZXU1KcZGC7
@QuancyClayborne I tried a Beyond Meat burger from Whole Foods a few years ago. It was just OK. I’d rather spend my money - and calories - on a real meat burger.
Makin' Beyond meat enchiladas with red sauce for dinner. I dont feel well but I'll suck it up for my viejo.
We 💛 the @BeyondMeat burger at Bistro 1908. Use your meal plan to get and a drink for just one punch! #Vegetarian #JMUDining https://t.co/wp38GQBTmF
@guapdad4000 Beyond meat and AMD

Y'all better stop eating that Beyond Meat, Impossible Meat and whatever else they create in a lab. Before you know it you walking around with cancer and an extra arm growing out the side of your neck.

Shafer has three delicious burger options today, including the plant-based @BeyondMeat burger!

Check the menu here or on https://t.co/bc7BooSbRa! https://t.co/1Vbwn2KrMf

@BlackCherryCor @engadget Thought you were talking about KFC stock at first Cor, that “Beyond Meat” was solely their new product.  And I thought “how could KFC grow any bigger than they already are?”  Looked it up, I’ll check it out!  And FYI, I eat this all the time: https://t.co/McFa8KyhW6
LMAO @kfc & @BeyondMeat said F*CK @PopeyesChicken #vegan 😂🖤 https://t.co/EeM6MiBz26
@engadget “Beyond Meat”.  Doesn’t sound too promising.  🤢 #KFC

@makalajohnson__ There are SOOOO many mock meats on the market. If you want true meat tasting things go for Gardein or Beyond Meat or No Evil Foods. But I like mushrooms, jackfruit, bean based things as my meat subs!!!
The future is #plantbased 🌱❤️😊 https://t.co/syHqzFywd2 @VegNews @GrowPlantBased @BeyondMeat #Vegan
@BurgerKing question ? Will there be a designated grill for the @BeyondMeat burgers ? Asking for myself
@morgesona Moringstar Farms has the best breakfast sausage. I am a slut for Beyond Meat Burgers (I ate 8 in one week 😅). But my mom’s been a vegetarian for 27 years and I’m mostly one.
Gonna make some Beyond Meat spaghetti with bell peppers and mushrooms. Gonna grab some garlic bread too. #spaghettiSunday
Hell yeah! Gonna make a lasagna with beyond meat. Gonna be so good. 😋
I think I like Beyond meat better than morning star.
My Viejo came home from the commissary with Beyond meat! He wants to try it. 😊
@bgomezreports @jimcramer @BeyondMeat @CNBC @SquawkStreet And a bleak future it is
@Gingerkidd130 @BeyondMeat HOW WAS IT?
@hoopism Grilled veggies and Beyond Meat Spicy Italian Sauage
@nicoterriamon Did it have the skin texture of sausage at all? Because the Beyond Meat sausage does and it’s the only one I’ve had that’s been actually enjoyable tbh

@Pixxydoodle @TailgatingChall @BeyondMeat @DannyLeBlanc24 @McGuireSuzette @4judyblue @BusseDenise @Varightone1 @nasyryus_hill @spyderrider63 @SKocey101 @dega_boy_87 @jhcowboy3 @CMANGO @rudyglove27 @MamaPKL Thanks Val 😊
I played Spades at a BBQ...my card has been renewed for a year. I did bring Beyond Meat burgers and LaCroix so maybe only for 6 months
Holy crap. Everything @FieldRoast makes is amazing. I had the corn dog nuggets tonight and good. lord. I am obsessed. Them and @BeyondMeat are reinventing vegetarian cuisine here. 💜
So everyone has discovered @BeyondMeat burgers because I haven’t been able to find them in my stores in 3 weeks😠😨.  I should have kept it to myself !
@BeyondMeat I’ve been a fan of your brand ever since my guy was on @NPR like 6 years ago or more. Really exciting to see the growth of the company. Keep up the good work!
Sign of the times! Great #vegan news @BeyondMeat https://t.co/u4V7ePiLE6

@rachelmercer @cpbgroup That probably works for typical consumers, but seems to be the double-edged sword for legacy brands, a game-changing event would need to get people to reengage. @ImpossibleFoods & @BeyondMeat are doing that for me w/ @TGIFridays & @WhiteCastle. PavingforPizza is 👌though.

sorry the beyond meat burger is better than the impossible one
